data.name: Monster Ultra Sunrise
data.description: A refreshing orange beverage that has 75mg of caffeine per serving. Every can has two servings.

data.name: Black Coffee
data.description: The classic, the average 8oz. serving of black coffee has 95mg of caffeine

data.name: Americano
data.description: Sometimes you need to water it down a bit... and in comes the americano with an average of 77mg. of caffeine per serving.

data.name: Sugar free NOS
data.description: Another orange delight without the sugar. It has 130 mg. per serving and each can has two servings

data.name: 5 Hour Energy
data.description: And amazing shot of get up and go! Each 2 fl. oz. container has 200mg of caffeine to get you going
